website_summaries.verdict: Provides a boost of energy to overweight, lethargic cats.
pros: Free of corn, wheat, and soy
Chicken is listed as the first ingredient
Comes in a convenient resealable bag
Provides a noticeable energy boost that leads to healthy weight loss
cons: Kibbles are on the smaller side, not appealing to all cats

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat, happy carpet
customer_reviews.text: This food is a miracle worker for hairballs. My cat was throwing up 1-2 times per week on the indoor weight control formula. I switched him over to weight control+hairball, and the vomiting has completely stopped! Happy cat, happy carpet! While I haven't been able to get my cat to lose weight on this food, he hasn't gained weight either (I feed him 1/2 cup a day, and he weighs 14 lbs). I can't bring myself to feed him less than that...poor guy is hungry all the time.
customer_reviews.author: r0ck3t

customer_reviews.title: As always my cat loves Blue Buffalo.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the kibbles were a bit larger. I decided on this food for hairball control after reading about another brand which keeps changing it's formula. My cat seems to just swallow the small bits and doesn't crunch them like her other dry food. It would also be nice to find a hairball food that wasn't chicken based. My cat isn't a fan of chicken, she likes fish and beef food. If this was available in another variety like salmon or bigger kibbles I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marcieanne

customer_reviews.title: Great food to mix with wet. First ingredient is chicken!
customer_reviews.text: My cat does really like this food. The first ingredient is deboned chicken, so it's immediately better than most commercial brands. It also does not have corn (which is great because corn is a completely unnecessary ingredient for cat food). Coupled with the convenience of dry food, it makes this food one of my favorites to get for my cat. It is easier than feeding raw if you don't have that much time. Also, I put some water in the kibble or mix with wet. Constantly using dry is bad for your pet's kidneys!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Dewey-tested and approved.
customer_reviews.text: Dewey has owned us since early August, and he has yet to hurl a hairball. (His hair is medium-length.) The smell of this kibble isn't obnoxious, and he took to it readily. We sometimes feed him the regular (not weight control) formula, but this is his mainstay.
customer_reviews.author: Earache

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good food
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good food, and all three of our cats will eat it. I also like the self-sealing bag. Great for cats that may have sensitive teeth, as the kibbles are really small. I will order it again as two of the cats expect it every day.
customer_reviews.author: mattroffact

customer_reviews.title: Gave My Cat Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My cat seemed to really like this food for about the first week until it got into her system good and then, oh boy! She had major diarrhea and wasn't eating like she used too. She never emptied her bowl and she ALWAYS empties her bowl! Her whole demeanor changed and you could tell she didn't feel good. I put her back on the Friskies Indoor Delights that she always loved and within 1 days there was no more diarrhea and she is now eating normal again. I'm giving 3 stars because I realize that it's not the product's fault that my cat can't tolerate it; however, I still think it's WAY overpriced for the amount that you get
customer_reviews.author: Prestige Document Services LLC

customer_reviews.title: Good for constipated cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat was sadly having smelly loose bowel movements from the hair ball formula. It's def a good brand, we've used the senior formula with good results, but this type probably has too much insoluble fiber for her tummy, she has both ibs-d and -c. I'm switching her back to wellness core grain free. I should mention, Marley was a huge fan of the flavor and screamed for more snack lol, but it was obvious her ibs couldn't handle it.
customer_reviews.author: B. laurenson

customer_reviews.title: Cat food
customer_reviews.text: I hope no one has the experience that we have had our new Cat from the shelter cannot tolerate the hair ball cat food. It caused extreme diarrhea and poor kitty was in distress before I came to what was going on. It is not fun to give a long haired torte a bath twice in one week especially one that is not accustomed to having one. Also learn from my mistake when mixing the previous cat food to the new do not mix the whole bag it is a bugger to pick out the hair ball recipe from the sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wintle

customer_reviews.title: good food but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My cats light this food but I am very disappointed at how expensive this is. I know this is a better food to feed your cats but I just cannot see myself paying this price for the small of a bag every week. We have five cats and one of them throws up her food a lot because of hairballs and I just cannot afford to keep buying this. We have chose to stick with meow mix hairball control and the price is much better
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey T.

customer_reviews.title: great food
customer_reviews.text: My cat only eats Blue Buffalo and she is a long hair cat so we need a hairball control and she is getting a little heavy so the weight control is a must. The only drawback is that a 7 pound bag is the biggest you can get of this food.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Stuve

customer_reviews.title: My Vet approves
customer_reviews.text: I asked my vet if this food would be good for my kitty who is recovering from liver disease. He said that it's a healthy option and my kitty is doing great on it. (Check with your vet for your cat's particular needs. This review is not meant to diagnose, cure or treat any disease.) My cat is refusing to eat any other food after trying this one. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Steph Leppard

customer_reviews.title: Our cat LOVES, 😽 LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat purrs and trills in anticipation of being fed blue buffalo indoor hairball & weight control chicken, he absolutely LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JCiL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and neither one would touch this food. One is a male Maine coon who eats like a horse and just about everything I have fed him and the other is a female but she is a picky eater. I tried several times to feed it to them and they both walked away from their bowls. I let it sit in the bowl for several hours and every time they went to their bowl they sniffed and walked away. I would not recommend spending that much money on this food.
customer_reviews.author: fluffernutter

customer_reviews.title: Kibble did not appear to be fresh
customer_reviews.text: You hear all the stories about sub-par products sold on Amazon, right? Well, this product is one of those incidents, as far as the appearance of this cat food. It looked sub-par. The kibble wasn't the normal dark brown, freshly made, looking color, at all. The kibble appeared to be stale, or as if it had been in the bag so long that the first layer of kibble had worn off, leaving a smaller dingy off-brown color of the kibble. Unfortunately, I have no plans to purchase this product again on here.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Kitty gives it a 2 paws up.
customer_reviews.text: My cat's a bit heavy. I've been searching for a good formula of lower calorie food. She likes this brand. I mix it with Halo, and she never complains, never vomits, and her eyes are bright and her fur soft and shiny. I wait for it to go on sale, and that's when I purchase. Two paws up.
customer_reviews.author: Chetti

customer_reviews.title: my cat lost too much weights after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: My cat lost too much weight after a little over 2 months of eating this, she became too weak and starting throwing up. I switched her to the wilderness formula, and after just 2 days of it, she's back to jumping up on the window, and hasn't thrown up. So just keep a close eye.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever been woken up in the middle of the night to the sound of a cat retching up a hairball?! Not a great way to start the day. With this product I get a high quality food for my 15 year old cat, and no more late night/early morning retching. Since I switched to Blue I have noticed that he has more energy, less hairballs, and his coat is much softer. There was NO reduction in his shedding, but he is a cat and they are going to shed.
customer_reviews.author: SquarePeg

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero or negative stars I would. I wanted to try this food because of the coat benefits it was supposed to have. I slowly started adding it to my cats current food to introduce it. He immediately started avoiding this food and only picking out his old food. I should have known. I eventually got him completely switched over and now he is vomiting, has diarrhea, and does not want to eat. Don't buy this! It will make them sick!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: My Picky Cat Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I have a very finicky cat when it comes to food. He'll like it at first but lose interest before the bag is empty. This food is different. When he hears it hit the ball he takes off running to come eat. Then he devours it. His coat is healthy and he is happy and vibrant at a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was initially worried that she might not like this as it's for weight control
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. I was initially worried that she might not like this as it's for weight control. But she likes it better than her food before and she doesn't eat as much junk food anymore. She noticeably lost weight within about a week, which is great as her doctor told us to watch her weight.
customer_reviews.author: MkTyrtle

customer_reviews.title: Ralphie Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old cat was getting very fat & lazy. I started him on this food & he proceeded to not only lose a bit of weight he is now playing more with the 8 month old kittens which I brought home a few months ago - so it is very good to see him a bit more active. Actually they all like the food even the dog when kittens knock bowls onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: SN33510

customer_reviews.title: Not blue Buffalo's Fault
customer_reviews.text: My kitties have been get a little bit chunky, so I decided I'd buy weight control. It was a bust. They ate it for a couple of weeks, but then they went on strike. They drove me crazy. So today I bought regular Blue Buffalo, which they love.
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Tamenne

customer_reviews.title: No more hairballs!
customer_reviews.text: I normally feed my long haired cat Iams Hairball formula but she would still get hairballs. I saw this brand on Amazon and figured i would give it a try. She loves the taste and I have yet to see one single hairball!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a very rich or family in someway to earn my money legally I keep feeding them Friskies
customer_reviews.text: Dislike My cat loves it she hasn’t stopped eating And demands more every morning. I thought she was spoiled before but she’s beyond belief now. She’s More neurotic and far more demanding . Luckily I just got a promotion so I can keep the little beast,
customer_reviews.author: eve daggett

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food 👌
customer_reviews.text: This cat as a kitten was barfing and had diarrhea all the time. Since I am 84 years old I thought I was going to have to give him up but I had used Blue Buffalo for my dog for years so this change was a no brainier.
customer_reviews.author: C. CROTTS

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: Did the change the recipe? My cats used to love this, now they wont touch it. The picture shows my fat tabby ignoring the food in her dish and begging for change. My other cat was so uninterested that he left the room.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Small kibble
customer_reviews.text: Always want to give my pets healthy, natural food. They only like dry. They are currently on vet prescription food and want to change back. They liked the first few bites but now eat their current food and leave behind the Buffalo in their bowls. The kibble is so tiny. Not sure if its flavor or size. I'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it and have been known to open the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: My local pet superstores don't sell this item and Amazon is the only place I can find this particular blend to order. My cats love it and have been known to open the bag themselves when left unattended. Expensive, but all Blue Buffalo is premium and priced as such; however, the Prime option makes it worth it. We order a bag about every 3 weeks and the cats give it furry THUMBS up!
customer_reviews.author: Morestuff

customer_reviews.title: Cat seems to like it. then again...
customer_reviews.text: Cat seems to like it. Then again, he likes licking his own ass for hours so the bar is set pretty low. And ya, I'm not trying it to tell you whether or not it tastes like chicken and veggies. If you do however, let me know.
customer_reviews.author: EthanAndLiamHD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for hairballs
customer_reviews.text: My boogers always love them some Blue Buffalo! This particular kind has really helped both of my cats with hairballs. I have seen a significant change in how much they throw up. My oldest cat was throwing up lime green hairballs often and ended up fainting and shaking on the ground. I was terrified. I switched to this instead of the dark blue kind and he hasn’t thrown up that green bile since! Love this stuff. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Cornelissen

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: I feed the blue buffalo weight control to 2 of my cats that are overweight, it doesn’t seem to make them lose weight as I had hoped, but they haven’t gained either. I’m happy with and I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tbrown

customer_reviews.title: Works for My Kitty
customer_reviews.text: My picky kitty kat seems to like this food just fine. He eats wet food for the bulk of his diet, but he’s such a small eater that I leave some kibble down for him, as well. I got this because I wanted him to have something healthy & it seems to get great reviews in that department.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it and that is what counts.
customer_reviews.text: Love this...my older cat swallows his food then throws it up..this is a very small nugget and no my throwing up...I also noticed the cats coat seem nicer, can’t wait to see how they are doing weight wise at next vet visit
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hamski

customer_reviews.title: Our cat likes it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, our cat has not had any more hairballs and her fur is very soft since eating this catfood. It's nice to have it delivered - thank you! Update - 1-7-20 So far, our cat still likes this food and has not had any more hairballs, which we appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: My cat absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food so much that we put it in a slow feeder so he slows his intake. Great quality, from my understanding it is healthy, and my boy loves it! Very happy will buy again in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jen Gambuti

customer_reviews.title: My little guy is pretty picky. He didn't care for it at first ...
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is pretty picky. He didn't care for it at first even though I gradually introduced small amounts into his usual dry food. He eats it now, but it is blended (1/2 and 1/2) with what he's been accustomed to. It does seem to have a positive effect on the weight control though, even with being blended.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Did not help with Hairballs or weight.
customer_reviews.text: It did not help with Hairballs or weight. It is a bit pricey. The cats did enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cat food!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been giving Blue Buffalo hair ball control to my cat for awhile now and it has highly improved his hair balls, also he is a very picky eater and this is the only dry food he will even look at.
customer_reviews.author: Charmane Smith

customer_reviews.title: My finicky cats love this
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats don't know that its weight control and hairball control. They prefer it over most other "regular" dry cat foods. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: For cats who turn nose up at other healthy cat foods
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the weight control, but hairball occurrences do seem to be less when my cat is on this. In attempts to get him to eat as clean as possible, I've tried several brands of cat food that were gluten/grain free, with carbs from sweet potatoes, vegetables, etc. He didn't like any of them! This brown rice based formula seems to be a good compromise though since he'll actually eat it and I can still feel comfortable with the ingredient list.
customer_reviews.author: Jameroo85

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good & works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cat food for my cat to help her lose some weight and it really works! She loves the taste and it has helped her lose weight quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a diet
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves his food. Originally began with other Blue products which he liked too. As an indoor cat I try and give him exercise but he was really gaining weight. Hopefully this variety will keep him leaner and healthy when he is eating it for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: B B Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Cat Food on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Best cat food for overweight cats. My cat loves it and think it’s better for her then cheaper cat food. She never gets sick and never had a hair ball in 6 years. Love this cat food
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Always 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love it. I like that it has little 'bits'. Quality, quantity, affordability & loveability. A+ I definitely trust this product. A+ Going for a 3rd one after they finish.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Grant

customer_reviews.title: 13 yr old cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old diabetic cat loves this! Small pieces! She will even choose this over some of the canned cat food we've offered her!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but doesnt seem to help hairballs
customer_reviews.text: From the list of ingredients it seems pretty good. My cats seem to really like it, but my one cat actually threw up a hairball in the food dish... Doesn't seem to even make hairballs less.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and healthy according to my cats.
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this. We moved from their weight management formula to the indoor hair all weight management and the cats seem to like it more!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Our poor cat Mo love to eat everything in sight including ...
customer_reviews.text: Our poor cat Mo love to eat everything in sight including the other cat's hair. We have been working to keep his weight in check for a year now and decided to try a new food. He loves this one, eats a smaller portion than other foods we have tried and so far no hairballs.
customer_reviews.author: V.T.

customer_reviews.title: Controls hairballs and maintains a shiny coat
customer_reviews.text: I've been using blue buffalo for years! A little more expensive but worth it for my furry babies. Their food is free of dyes and all the yucky stuff! Helps my babies fur and skin and beautiful teeth! Love blue buffalo! Highly recommend.....oh and helps control those nasty hairballs
customer_reviews.author: Little Red

customer_reviews.title: Diet Food for Cats
customer_reviews.text: This is very good healthy low calorie Cat food but unfortunately my Fat Cat didn't like the taste and eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lovell

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food and it keeps them healthy and no more hairballs. So they stay healthy and I stay happy. Love this cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rita

customer_reviews.title: Not much difference
customer_reviews.text: I tried this food to help with the hairball problem. My cat is not finicky, but it took him awhile to eat this food. It smelled fishy. He did eventually eat it and I didn't notice it helping much. I went back to an old standby cat food & he started eating good again and the hairball problem is the same as when eating the Blue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Kitty is healthier now. Vet recommends because she needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitty is healthier now. Vet recommends because she needed leveling and this food has lecetin nibbles for eyes, skin and coat. Otherwise my white cat would have a prescription each month for lecetin drops at $60 pop or buy this food, no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my cat
customer_reviews.text: Has really helped my long hair cat with her hair balls. She gets them frequently, but this food has helped her pass them instead of vomiting them up.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Nice small pieces
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this dry food and nibbles on it off and on all day. She is an indoor cat so hoping this will help maintain a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bryant

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My Princess loves it. I started giving her wet food though so she just snacks on it between meals
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for my cat she didn't complain and the ingredients are good quality. I'll be buying a second bag .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients in this and wanted my cat to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients in this and wanted my cat to have the very best even though, to me, this is too expensive for cat food. He liked it and would eat it but it caused him to throw up a lot despite me slowly mixing it in with his old food. Definitely disappointed and it was a waste (for me). Went back to his old food and the throwing up stopped immediately. No clue why.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Happy carpet
customer_reviews.text: I have a long haired domestic and in the springtime but he starts shedding hey tenna to get hairballs like every child does this food helps him a lot with controlling this nothing is worse than waking up in the morning and step in a pile of hairball this food controls that and I've noticedthe few hairball upchuck he has how
customer_reviews.author: shawn kramer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My cats eat it and they can’t give a review. As for me they eat it, it helps digestive issues and no diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clapsadle

customer_reviews.title: Really helps eliminate hairballs
customer_reviews.text: Hairballs are far and few since my cat eats this variety of Blue Buffalo. He likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: The Painter

customer_reviews.title: No more puke
customer_reviews.text: My cats used to puke all the time and now their stomachs seem to finally be rid of their previous food. Happy they enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a better food for my two cats
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a better food for my two cats, and this one is perfect for them, with hairball and weight control. I have tried other foods from Blue Buffalo and others, including grain free foods, but now that I have found this one, it's a keeper. My cats really like it, too. Thanks, Blue Buffalo, for a great food, and to Amazon for giving me a great price on it.
customer_reviews.author: VAPetlover

customer_reviews.title: Helped the hairballs!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't heard either of my cats cough, or try to cough up a hair ball- since we stared using this.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu | Danny

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cat food
customer_reviews.text: My furry children enjoy this food/brand. I miss it with organic food that I prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Cherisse

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes this. The hairball control is really ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this. The hairball control is really working and I've seen any hairball out of my cat's month since I give him this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for fur softness and sheen
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a difference! Changing to this cat food legitimately changed my cat's coat to a softer, shinier sheen. She's approaching 15 years old, yet I've never noticed any change to her fur... until just recently when I changed her cat food to this Blue Buffalo Indoor mix. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller bag help.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to let the cats try something different and didn't want to buy a big bag(only thing to box store had).
customer_reviews.author: Randy Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: For a hairball remedy food, it's pitiful. My cat threw up this particular brand. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TX-girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - - cats eat less & poop less. Apparently there is truly less filler & more nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Billups

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cat food that controls weight
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 years old indoor cat who has gained weight. I had tried other brands of weight control cat foods. I started feeding him this brand about 15 days ago and his belly fat is gone and he seems lean. I am just spreading good words since I am sure there are other cat owners who are trying to get their cats to a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nishesh

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Cats still had hairballs. We have tried another brand and have seen better results. Cats did enjoy the food though.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Fat cat approved
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. Over the last few months my heavier cat lost weight while the (still heavy but not as much) cat maintained his weight. I wish it would come in a 15 pound bag though!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Happy vet
customer_reviews.text: Our vet is happy with our cat shedding a few pounds. He is no longer 19.6 pounds. Currently at 15.4 pounds in eight months.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Richard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seeing a big reduction in hairballs and dare I say a little weigh loss from my fatty??
customer_reviews.author: Allison Gollner

customer_reviews.title: I switched my cat's food to the Indoor Hairball Weight ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched my cat's food to the Indoor Hairball Weight Control formula a couple of years ago when she started turning her nose up to the hair ball remedy treats I was giving her. She has long fur, so I don't think we'll ever get rid of hair balls, but she has them maybe once a week now instead of almost daily. She also loves it so much that she wakes me up every morning for breakfast with purrs and snuggles, which might be irritating if it weren't so darn cute :)
customer_reviews.author: MacBethany

customer_reviews.title: Best food for our cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food. Perfect for our adult cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Lank

customer_reviews.title: Hoping For 1 Food Does It All
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 4 on flavor simply because I'm not sure if the girls don't care for the taste or if this food keeps them comfortably full. Feed 1/3 each twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri P.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't eat it. I gave it to a stray cat and he wouldn't eat it either. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Entz

customer_reviews.title: good for our cat and the environment
customer_reviews.text: My cat was on Iams and was constantly vomiting hairballs. I switched her over to this and not one hairball now. Its all natural, good for our cat and the environment, and the best money can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Braddock

customer_reviews.title: Best food for the cats
customer_reviews.text: They love this food. Less hairballs. They scarf this down.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Israel

customer_reviews.title: Good food, pricing eh
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves this food but inconsistant pricing. Its cheaper at petco.com on amazon o e month its $19.99 and the next its $26. So prob will just stick with petco until amazon figures out how to keep pricing somewhat consiaitant.
customer_reviews.author: Tygen reeder

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for cats with sensative stomachs
customer_reviews.text: I have a very furry cat that is prone to hairballs. She also has a sensitive stomach and would vomit regularly when we first got her. We tried a few different types of cat food before trying blue buffalo. Now our cat has gone from throwing up every single day to maybe once a month or two. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Edward Taylor Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Review From Bean
customer_reviews.text: ONLY thing my cat will eat that isn't the garbage from cheap, unhealthy brands. Bean highly recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: My cat looks very healthy
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Blue Buffalo. Her weight is good, her coat is very soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: He was getting a little belly from his previous food (Hill's Ideal Balance) and the vet recommended we get him a weight control food
customer_reviews.text: Our cat LOVES this food. He was getting a little belly from his previous food (Hill's Ideal Balance) and the vet recommended we get him a weight control food. So we got him this one, and he loves it way too much that he's eating it so much faster than his previous food, but he's still losing weight!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Stakich

customer_reviews.title: Cat devours it and it actually works on hairballs!
customer_reviews.text: For 2 years, I haven't found a cat food that my little guy has gone ga-ga over...until now. This is it. PLUS out of all the foods that "say" they help with hairballs, this one actually holds true. Very happy and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats and they love Blue Buffalo dry cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Etta Dorang

customer_reviews.title: Cat food good price
customer_reviews.text: My cat is over weight, so we chose to try this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Kobylinski

customer_reviews.title: Hole the bag.
customer_reviews.text: When i opened the box and took the bag out of the box. The bag had a hole in it but other then that it was fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sorell

customer_reviews.title: Monkey, my cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food! And it has probiotics in it. That’s very good bc he’s a fiv+ rescue. He also will NOT eat canned food. I’m able to pretty much maintain his weight.
customer_reviews.author: kayzee

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: We’ve two cats whom throw up on a constant basis as well as have soft stools due to other cat foods. We switched it up and all problems have seemed to cease.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marie Warth

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I personally can't say whether the flavor is great, my cats seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo Indoor & Hairball formula for cats
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients & no by products, grains, corn or wheat. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zirkel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Only product that has helped my long haired cat avoid hairballs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the list of ingredients💖
customer_reviews.text: Sofi just loves this food. Hope she looses weight! Food is dry add some olive oil works great for shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This food was great for my adult cat that is 4 yrs old because most foods she can't hold down due to hairball build up.. I highly recommend! (:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both of my cats seem to like it but I have yet to see any major ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats seem to like it but I have yet to see any major weight loss. Been using for about 6 mts now and although my cats seem to like it. I really not seeing any major changes. Will continue to try for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: B43V98

customer_reviews.title: This brand of cat food has made such a difference ...
customer_reviews.text: This brand of cat food has made such a difference for both of my cats. No more throwing up and bowel movement issues. Well worth the additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: sarina

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand, and so do I. I have a one cat with sensitive stomach and one who can eat anything. It really does keep the hair balls to a minimum. The price is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Falish

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Indoor Hairball & Weight Control Natural Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Indoor Hairball & Weight Control| Size:7 lbBLUE for Cats dry cat food recipes are made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. Starting with real meat as the 1st ingredient, they include wholesome grains, veggies and fruit, plus our exclusive, antioxidant-rich Life Source Bits to support your feline’s overall health and well-being. BLUE for Cats has formulations to meet all of your cat’s life stage and lifestyle needs, from hairball and weight control to sensitive stomach and healthy aging recipes. BLUE for Cats is a product of the Blue Buffalo company. Based in the United States, Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Formulated to support the health and well-being of your feline friend, BLUE for Cats features only the finest natural ingredients: Delicious, protein-rich, Deboned Chicken. Wholesome whole grains and veggies. NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals.
feature_bullets: REAL MEAT FIRST: Blue Buffalo dry cat food always features real meat as the first ingredient. High-quality protein from real chicken helps your cat maintain strong muscles. Plus, it contains wholesome whole grains, garden veggies and fruit.

HAIRBALL & WEIGHT CONTROL: Made with a blend of natural fiber sources including cellulose and psyllium seed husks to help control hairballs, plus it’s formulated with an optimal blend of protein and calories to help your cat achieve and maintain an ideal body weight.

WITH LIFESOURCE BITS: This formula contains BLUE’s exclusive LifeSource Bits – a precise blend of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals carefully selected by holistic veterinarians and animal nutritionists, to support immune system health, life stage requirements, and a healthy oxidative balance.

NATURAL CAT FOOD: BLUE dry cat food is made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. It never contains chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.
Contains one (1) 7 lb. bag of BLUE Indoor Hairball & Weight Control Natural Adult Dry Cat Food, Chicken & Brown Rice
